description:
The roads and highways of West Virginia can be dangerous places. The Miley Legal Group of Clarksburg practices personal injury law to compensate those who have been hurt there.

The Miley Legal Group has enjoyed success pursuing claims arising from accidents involving cars, trucks, and tractor trailers. Some cases are about defective products. We have assisted where the outcomes were severe-brain injury, the injury of a child, and the wrongful death of a family member.

The Miley Legal Group knows state law. The law firm's founder, attorney Timothy R. Miley, serves in the state legislator as chairman of the Judiciary Committee. His experience in the law goes back 20 years. He often arrives at settlements favorable to clients, but he is not afraid to step into the courtroom.

Tim Miley is the author of The 7 Biggest Mistakes that Will Wreck Your West Virginia Accident Case. He takes a particular interest in teaching the ins and outs of dealing with insurance companies.

We work on a contingency basis-if we don't win, you don't pay. We offer free consultations. We can arrange to meet you at your convenience, evenings or weekends. We'll meet with you anywhere-at our offices a block from the courthouse in Clarksburg, in the comfort of your own home, or in your hospital room if that is where you are.

Though the highways are sometimes unfriendly, The Miley Legal Group never is. We try to bring a personal touch to what can be a harsh business. We are eager to get you back on your feet, and compensated for the injuries you have suffered.

The Miley Legal Group is the firm that fights like a tiger for you.
